A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Making money is the theme now. It was like a 80s hindi blockbuster\, where the script is written on the sets and solutions are found to take a story ahead. Political correctness\, SJW enters in the story and destroys what was good in the original trilogy. People were given role like a forced ad-placement in movies\, rather than what the story demands. On second thought\, no story. 1977\,$11 million (~50 million in 2017 money) produced a masterpiece. Rae\, is a Mary Sue - she is GOD\, and knows how to do everything. Maybe she is a futuristic android with advanced programming. So many plotholes with no logic scenes and sub-plots. And what is with the humour? Everyone trying to do a Marvel. Disney\, you have taken the heart out and stomped it. You have drained the soul and strangulated it. May the force not be with you.
